answers.answer: I'm overweight hun n this is my second.child! Here if u need to chat!

Hey hun gm don't feel alone...im not heavy but they did find early gestational diabetis and im 19 wks...u just have to take of ure self eat right if u would like to inbox me in facebook or in m edhelp....I can help u out as much as I can and just chat up...i can give u some tips on to kp ure sugar under controlled and healthy not only bc im diabetic its just that before getting pregnant I learned to just eat healthy in general...but dont worry we are here for u hun dont feel alone and congrats and u will have a healthy baby

Hi im overweight o know how you feel but your baby will be health just look after yourself and don't stress to much I felt very low the other day a doctor wasnt so nice about me being overweight but they dont understand so you not alone x

Awwwwe!!! Thank you so much!! This means a lot for me! Im trying to eat healthy and Im taking my insulin shots at time. I use 132 units daily of insulin and I was using Metformin (Glucophage) but I quit taking it because it was not making a difference on my blood sugar levels and I think its better for the baby to have less medications. Thank you for your support!
I'm overweight and I'm pregnant for the first time. If u want I'm ere if u need to talk.
I'm also overweight hun.. 224lbs with my 3rd baby. I'm also here if u wanna talk
Im a bigger girl you can feel free to message me whenever you wanna talk im due with my first son in June

Im overweight girl. I was so scared that I would have complications because I am 20+ pounds overweight. Im almost 30 weeks and I've had a near perfect pregnancy minus the hurrendous morning sickness until my second trimester. I still worry about my weight but as long as im eating healthy and trying, I know my babygirl will be fine :) feel free to message me if you want!!

I'm overweight. At my first visit, my doctor told me to not gain ANY weight this entire pregnancy. So basically I had to LOSE weight as I gained baby. I was like lol ummmmmm fat chance. But I'm 22 weeks now and have lost weight. I weigh less halfway through than I did pre-pregnancy. Idk how I did it. Just smaller meals (to avoid puking) and healthier choices I guess. I have a normal low risk pregnancy but SOLELY because I'm overweight, it's listed as a pregnancy complication. I'm "more likely" to have preeclampsia or gestational diabetes or need a c-section. But the good news is, you will be monitored extra closely! Things are actually less likely to go wrong and any issues will be caught before it becomes a problem. Try to think of it that way. :)
Well they told me i was overweight for my height  and age and im 6 weeks 4 days

question: Hey!!! Im 14 weeks pregnant, I have Type 1 Diabetes and Im overweight (not happy about it but Im taking all the precautions for my baby). I just want to talk to other heavy mommys and share fears! Sometimes I feel so sad thinking that something could happen to my baby. I just want to know that someone went thru this and the baby came healthy! Thanks! Blessings!
title: Any Overweight before pregnant mommy? I feel alone! lol
